text: gramina arabikalil ninnum pinneakkam mari ninnavareat ni parayuka: kanatta akramanasesiyulla oru janavibhagatte neritanayi ninnal valiye vilikkappetum.avar kilatannunnat vare ninnal avarumayi yud'dham ceyyentivarum. appeal ninnal anusarikkunna paksam allahu ninnalkk uttamamaya pratiphalam nalkunnatanâ€Œ. mump ninnal pintirinnu kalannatupeale (iniyum) pintirinnu kalayunna paksam vedanayeriya siksa avan ninnalkku nalkunnatumanâ€Œ
